aboutBio:

A former U.S. Department of Labor-OFCCP investigator, Rod has led complex EEO investigations, wage audits, and multi-state compliance initiatives, bringing both technical precision and a deep commitment to equity.

Blending advanced HR analytics with neuroscience-informed leadership, Rod helps organizations design cultures where compliance and compassion work hand in hand.
